tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
“Elevated” is the word that first come to my mind as soon as I entered the clinic.
Extremely clean, hygienic and serene – was the environment inside the clinic.
I had visited Gums and Braces for consultation for full mouth for my father.
I believe “punctuality is the sole of profession“ and was very impressed by their commitment  towards time. We were taken in apt ON TIME. 
They had asked us to fill a form which asked for our details, our problem, medications etc. Thus they knew about us before we even meeting them and they can check accordingly.
As soon as we entered,  the doctors were all set and ready to examine. 
Both the head doctors – Dr. Sneh and Dr. Tuhina – are extremely calm and friendly.
They closely examined the entire case, explained us the situation, the various options that would be possible and also told us the factors that should be seen while selecting the options. They were able to communicate it so lucidly that it helps a common man to understand the problem and then make a sound and informed decision. 
We can easily make out – that for them – patient’s convenience and his satisfaction with the treatment- are the 2 sole objectives.
We are looking forward for the balance part of treatment with them….

FROM enhancing the accuracy of diagnosis and increasing patients knowledge - TO - maintaining a good patient’s -doctor’s relationship , AND as being one stop solution for all your dental problems -  GUMS AND BRACES EARNS MY HIGHEST RECOMMENDATION !!!
CA. Ramita Shah.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Generally when we plan to visit a dentist we are scared..but Dr Sneh Mehta is one of the dentist who made my father so comfortable and explained the process and patiently replied all the queries he had. In fact, my entire family by now has been treated by Dr Sneh and Dr Tuhina Mehta and they do an amazing job !! Thanks and kudos to Gums and Braces !!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. Sneh Mehta is a meticulous clinician who pays attention to the smallest details of the task at hand. What's more, he keeps his patient informed about every step as he goes through them. As a patient keen to understand what's going, this is of immeasurable importance to me.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review: Personally I like young doctors who are most updated with the new technology. My impression of Dr Sneh is very much high on expected lines and I surely feel that he is trustworthy, honest and highly competent in delivering excellent results. My daughter who is planning for braces is equally satisfied and for me that is most important

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: It is really good to see a dentist who actually explains you the problem in a layman's language and this gives a feeling of comfort to the patient. Dr. Sneh Mehta also had an in-depth look and took time to study my teeth after which he suggested me with few treatments.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review: All my questions and concerns were cleared and paid heed towards while being courteous. Both staff and doctors were extremely nice.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,

review: Dr. Sneh is an expert you can completely rely on for your dental treatment. Not only he is great at his work but also maintains transparency with patients and guides them well on available options. The clinic atmosphere is very calm and positive which helps patients a lot. I recommend  Dr. Sneha as first choice to fellow citizens.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I visited Gums and Braces for my 2 year old son who fell down while playing and broke his teeth. I was thinking how will I manage my extremely restless son but Dr Sneh made the whole experience very easy and peacefully managed everything. I highly recommend him for his alertness and easy going nature to make patient at ease and being very good In his line of work.
